We will not have a formal topic next Saturday as the meeting will be more of a mixer as several people have different project ideas and topics to discuss.  I will try to get some snacks and refreshments for next week as well.

The lab computers have Adobe Creative Suite 3 (CS3), Autodesk Maya 2008 Unlimited, Unreal Engine 3, Microsoft Visual Studio, Game Studio 2.0 and the XNA Framework, for those who wish to tinker or show off their skills.

The Game Developers Meet Up Group is open to anyone interested in promoting, learning about, or working in any area of Game Development in South Florida.   

Members are also encouraged to join the South Florida Chapter of the International Game Developers Association at http://www.igda.org/miami</description><photo_url>http://photos1.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/e/b/5/global_3465765.jpeg</photo_url><updated>Sat Sep 27 14:10:02 EDT 2008</updated><feedesc /><questions /><name>The South Florida Game Development October Meetup</name></item></items></results>
